subScenes.name: 礼貌开场
subScenes.description: 员工向经理礼貌提出请假请求

responses.text: Sure, what's up?
Of course, how can I help?
Yeah, go ahead.

qaPairs.usageNote: 用轻松语气开场，避免突兀

qaPairs.speakerText: I'd like to request some time off next week.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我想申请下周请几天假。

responses.text: I'm sorry to hear that. What's the reason?
responses.text_cn: 听到这个有点遗憾，是什么原因？

responses.text: Got it. How many days?
Sure, I can help with that.

qaPairs.usageNote: 直接说明意图，避免绕弯子

subScenes.name: 说明原因
subScenes.description: 清晰解释请假原因，体现责任感

qaPairs.speakerText: I need to take care of a family emergency — my mom's in the hospital.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我得处理个家庭紧急情况，我妈住院了。

responses.text: Oh no, I'm so sorry. Hope she gets better soon.
responses.text_cn: 天啊，真遗憾，希望她早日康复。

responses.text: That's understandable. How long will you be out?
Thanks for letting me know.

qaPairs.usageNote: 简明说明原因，不夸张不隐瞒

qaPairs.speakerText: I'm really sorry to ask, but I need 3 days — from Monday to Wednesday.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 很抱歉提出，但我需要请三天，周一到周三。

responses.text: No problem, I'll mark it in the system.
Can you do Tuesday instead? We've got a big meeting Monday.
responses.text_cn: 周二行吗？周一有重要会议。

responses.text: Got it. Take care of your mom.

qaPairs.usageNote: 明确天数，主动配合调整

subScenes.name: 安排交接
subScenes.description: 主动提出工作交接方案，减轻经理负担

qaPairs.speakerText: I've already updated the project tracker and briefed Sarah on my tasks.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 我已经更新了项目进度表，并跟莎拉交代了手头工作。

responses.text: That's awesome — you're a lifesaver.
Thanks for being proactive. Anything urgent I should know?
responses.text_cn: 谢谢主动，有紧急事项吗？

responses.text: Good. Just keep me posted.

qaPairs.usageNote: 提前准备交接，体现专业度

qaPairs.speakerText: I'll be available by email for anything critical.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 如果有紧急事，我随时在线回复邮件。

responses.text: Perfect. Don't overdo it though — rest up!
responses.text_cn: 很好，但别太拼，好好休息！

responses.text: Okay, but don't check emails unless it's urgent.
Got it. We'll handle it.

qaPairs.usageNote: 表明可联系性，但强调休息优先

subScenes.name: 确认与道别
subScenes.description: 确认请假获批，礼貌结束对话

qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 那我的请假是批准了吗？

responses.text: Yep, it's in the system. Enjoy your time with your mom.
responses.text_cn: 嗯，已登记，陪妈妈好好休息。

responses.text: Confirmed. Just send me the form by Friday.
responses.text_cn: 确认了，周五前发下申请表。

responses.text: Yeah, you're all set.

qaPairs.speakerText: Thanks so much for understanding. I really appreciate it.
qaPairs.speakerTextCn: 非常感谢你的理解，真的很感激。

responses.text: Of course, family comes first.
Anytime. Take care!
No problem. See you next week.

qaPairs.usageNote: 表达感谢，强化良好印象
